snippet.title: Teaser for the game Strings of Fate Ⅺ: Magic Dream
snippet.description: The world of Litea is once again in danger. An ancient evil has awakened and is ready to emerge from its imprisonment. The heroes of the game will have to deal with mysterious dreams that invade their lives. These dreams not only prevent them from sleeping at night, but also influence their actions and decisions in real life. Gradually, the dreams become more and more intrusive, and the heroes realize that they must understand their nature in order to save themselves and their world. But to do this, they will have to go through many trials, unravel ancient mysteries and confront powerful enemies.
